package.name: wicked
package.description: Wicked is a wiki application for Horde.
package.notes: * [jan] Add Swedish translation (Arne Nordmark <nordmark@mech.kth.se>). * [jan] Add Danish translation (Erling Preben Hansen <erling@eph.dk>).

release.notes: * [jan] Fix rendering attached images with Mediawiki syntax (Bug #10570). * [jan] Fix links to add new pages on pages with non-ascii names (Bug #10612). * [gwr] Support rendering bold text and code section in the rst renderer.
* [jan] Fix links to existing pages with non-ascii or special characters (Bug #10672).
* [gwr] Corrected teletype format for the reST renderer. * [gwr] Support rendering lists in the reST renderer. * [jan] Add Slovak translation (Martin Matuška <martin@matuska.org>).
* [jan] Fix accidental deletion of all attachments (Bug #10875). * [jan] Fix permission check when merging and renaming pages (Bug #11332).
* [jan] Work around broken Text_Wiki header parser. * [jan] Add reST renderers for blockquote and emphasis.

* [jan] Fix parsing of headings in other than the default rule (Bug #12211). * [jan] Remove synchronization code. * [jan] Convert all templates to Horde_View. * [jan] Add Most Popular and Least Popular pages to sidebar selection. * [jan] Show at least 10 revisions on the RecentChanges page. * [jan] Fix sorting page lists by date.

* [jan] Add table layout (Bug #12402). * [jan] Fix DB column width for page contents (Bug #12407). * [mjr] Fix creating a new page from search results (Bug #12381). * [jan] Fix syntax error in wicked CLI script (Bug #12378).
* [jan] Fix generating the most recent changes. * [jan] Request CAPTCHA when creating pages too.
* [jan] Fix rendering of full text search results. * [jan] Fix rendering pages in portal blocks. * [jan] Improve finding like pages if name contains digits.
* [jan] Add Swedish translation (Arne Nordmark <nordmark@mech.kth.se>). * [jan] Add Danish translation (Erling Preben Hansen <erling@eph.dk>).
